author: Source: Times-series.co.uk
title: Imelda Staunton wins theatre award for Gypsy musical performance - Times-series.co.uk
text:
Imelda Staunton has won best performance in a musical for her role in Gypsy at the UK Theatre Awards 2015. The show is loosely based on famous striptease artist Gypsy Rose Lee and features music by Jule Styne and lyrics by Stephen Sondheim.
 Times-series.co.uk.
